comments.body: We have been shortening this to 3-clause BSD.  Would you like to modify it, or would you prefer not to?

We have been allowing this one to slide actually. We were really strict for a little while, but there were some disagreements as to what qualified as an acceptable license string. This one has been allowed in practice. Though we should really pick some strict criteria and stick with them.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +62,66 @@about:
  home: http://github.com/bioidiap/bob.ip.facedetect
  license: Modified BSD License (3-clause)
  summary: Face Detection using a Cascade of Boosted LBP Features
